name: You gonna cry?
description:
You Gonna Cry?

Hi, my name is Stephen, I'm 13 years and a half and my mom says I'm a very emotional boy. This is the story of this one time, at recess, when this jerk Kevin made fun of me in front of my crush, Rebecca. Rebecca is so beautiful, she deserves to be with a nice guy like me, not Kevin.

Controls

Credits

Art by Rodrigo. Insta @rodrigo_g_sousa

Music and Sound Design by Jérémy. Insta @studiocosmophone

Code by Guilherme. GitHub GuilhermeGSousa
